attributes.action: Introduce legislation to ensure publishers of print materials have the responsibility of making such matter available - if requested - in alternative formats i.e. braille, large print, electronic, by way of example.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While in recent years legislation has begun to help with some aspects of copyright for production of items in alternative formats, the huge gap will not be lessened unless additional steps are put in place to ensure that equal access for non-print readers is assured.
